name: Nowhere Fast "No Escape" 7" e.p.
description: The debut 7" from Liverpool's NOWHERE FAST, on Mind Rot Records. 8 songs of raw no-nonsense hardcore, influenced by the likes of Negative FX, SOA, Last Rights and Out Cold.

name: Teenage Gluesniffers "Nervous Breakdown" CD
description: This is the debut full length from Milan, Italy's trio, Teenage Gluesniffers.  They play pop-punk in the vein of 90's Lookout! bands and the Ramones so if that's what you are into, you will love this release.  They previously released a split 7" with Los Di Maggios out on Knowhere Records and are ready for this full length featuring 11 solid tracks that do not slow down and will quickly have you singing along.  So get ready to head "back to the 90's" with this release and give it a listen.
